import React from 'react' import { FaEdit, FaUser } from 'react-icons/fa' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const ProfileSection=({profile,followerCount,followingCount})=> { return (
{/* User Info */}

{profile.first_name}

{`@${profile.username}`}

{/* Profile and Edit Icons */}
{/* Profile Icon Link */} {/* Edit Profile Icon Link */}
{/* Bio Section */}

{profile.bio || 'No bio available'}

) } export default ProfileSection
